div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

img.title: Alert
img.a: Affton Schools Closed Through End of School Year

div.p: Affton School District will close our buildings for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year, although learning and support services will continue through our last day of school. Need help? Contact info@afftonschools.net or call our COVID-19 Helpline at 314-633-5911.

link.script: renderEmergencyMsg("Affton Schools Closed Through End of School Year", "2020/04/10", "2020/05/29");

div.div: Click here for information and updates on COVID-19.
div.a: Read More about COVID-19 Information & Updates

a.title: Affton Names 2020-2021 Teachers Of The Year

div.a: Affton Names 2020-2021 Teachers Of The Year
div.div: Ray Crites, seventh-grade math teacher at Rogers Middle School, has been named Affton School District’s 2020-2021 Teacher of the Year.
div.a: Read More about Affton Names 2020-2021 Teachers Of The Year

a.title: 2020 Soar Award Winners Named For Affton Schools; Superintendent’s Award Also Presented

div.a: 2020 Soar Award Winners Named For Affton Schools; Superintendent’s Award Also Presented
div.div: A record-breaking 35 staff members, volunteers, and community partners were honored at Affton School District’s 24th Annual Service and Outstanding Achievement Recognition (SOAR) Awards on April 22. A special Superintendent’s Award was also presented.
div.a: Read More about 2020 Soar Award Winners Named For Affton Schools; Superintendent’s Award Also Presented

div.p: The mission of the Affton School District is to prepare all of our students to become confident and capable citizens through rigorous, customized learning.

div.div: 8701 Mackenzie Rd, Affton, MO 63123 | Phone (314) 638-8770 | Fax (314) 631-0030
